member.name: T:gardnerAPIs.Common.OperationResult`1
member.summary: Generic operation envelope used by business/service layers.

member.name: P:gardnerAPIs.Common.OperationResult`1.IsSuccess
member.summary: True when the operation succeeded end-to-end.

member.name: P:gardnerAPIs.Common.OperationResult`1.Result
member.summary: Successful result payload (null if IsSuccess = false).

member.name: P:gardnerAPIs.Common.OperationResult`1.ErrorMessages
member.summary: One or more errors when IsSuccess = false (normalized, human-friendly).

member.name: P:gardnerAPIs.Common.OperationResult`1.CorrelationId
member.summary: Optional correlation/tracing id if you want to set it.

member.name: P:gardnerAPIs.Common.OperationResult`1.HttpStatus
member.summary: Optional HTTP status associated with this operation (if applicable).

member.name: T:gardnerAPIs.Common.ErrorResponse
member.summary: Normalized error block. Backward-compatible with your previous structure, but extended with friendly fields.

member.name: P:gardnerAPIs.Common.ErrorResponse.details
member.summary: Optional list of granular error items (from SL 'details').

member.name: P:gardnerAPIs.Common.ErrorResponse.raw
member.summary: The raw payload we parsed (only for diagnostics).

member.name: T:gardnerAPIs.Common.ErrorDetails
member.summary: Legacy/compatible shell used by your existing clients.

member.name: T:gardnerAPIs.Common.ErrorDetailItem
member.summary: Single detail row, when SL provides an array in the error.

members.member: Auto-managed SAP B1 Service Layer v2 client: - Logs in on demand with technical user from config - Keeps session via cookies + local expiry timestamp - Retries once on 401 / "Invalid session"/"Session timeout" - Can BYPASS SSL if ServiceLayerOptions.SkipTlsVerify=true (DEV ONLY)
